name: Race Puip
description:
Game made for #loweffortjam. 

Made with Scratch, the sounds it's a popurri with free sounds and my voice.

Art 100% handmade 

And the suuuper music made with DPM app!

2 players and one winner!

Controls W A S D for Green car....mmm or Red car? Arrow keys for...green

Find out!
